title: Help finding this funky font
content:
This one seems so familiar but I just can't seem to find it- or anything close.

It's sort of like a Cooper but in script and with those big swash caps.

Any suggestions?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110194638/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_43.png) | 7.98 KB |
author: cynicdesign

comments.content: Candice (variously available from Elsner+Flake, URW, and Linotype), except that the lowercase p has a manually added swash. The drop shadow treatment is added, too, of course.
